column5: hey yall may head there today but i would like to know if there is any open water, my mom hates driving for no reason
North west winds gusting to 70kph today....be careful not to get blown in...mind you, you could cast a mile out there!  Wish I could help ya on the open water thing....
was there on sunday lots of ice still op open downtown open spit iced back harbour(outer harbour partial open)
thnx for the update,  i ended up making a few cast at another location on the waterfront, only stayed about 15 mins, mom was waiting in the car

Yah today was bunk for fishing..  that cold snap last night turned em off...  Was out myself with fellow ofners snag and Billy Curtis and caught nothing but paint rollers and zebra mussels.. Wait, almost hooked into an old squaw.  hahaah  tight loops HD
Your mom sounds like an angel.  Either that or you have good dirt on her.  How did you get her chauffeur you to a fishing date?   forrest
does she at least clean the fish??

haha that made me laugh  well, i was straddling along with her all day, places i dont like to go, shopping etc, it was on the way home and she decided after all that i been through with her haha to let me cast a few,  first of all, about the cleaning, she would rather buy a fresh salmon from loblaws, i usually do the cleaning
